Class SwitchInlineQueryChosenChat

java.lang.Object
io.github.natanimn.telebof.types.media_and_service.SwitchInlineQueryChosenChat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SwitchInlineQueryChosenChat extends Object implements Serializable
This object represents an inline button that switches the current user to inline mode in a chosen chat, with an optional default inline query.
Since:
3 March 2025
Version:
0.9
Author:
Natanim

  • Field Details

    • query

      public String query
      Optional. The default inline query to be inserted in the input field. If left empty, only the bot's username will be inserted

    • allow_user_chats

      public Boolean allow_user_chats
      Optional. True, if private chats with users can be chosen

    • allow_bot_chats

      public Boolean allow_bot_chats
      Optional. True, if private chats with bots can be chosen

    • allow_group_chats

      public Boolean allow_group_chats
      Optional. True, if group and supergroup chats can be chosen

    • allow_channel_chats

      public Boolean allow_channel_chats
      Optional. True, if channel chats can be chosen
